articles.title: Why new weight loss drugs are out of reach for millions of older Americans - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: Obesity drugs like Wegovy and Zepbound are capturing the attention of celebrities and showing promising results in helping people shed pounds. But those drugs remain out of reach for millions of older Americans.
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) New obesity drugs are showing promising results in helping some people shed pounds but the injections will remain out of reach for millions of older Americans because Medicare is forb… [+8990 chars]
